Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Temporin-1CEb (T-1CEb, natural AMPs; Leu-rich; UCLL1c; frog, amphibians, animals; XXA; BBL)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is 64.3% similar toTemporin-1RNa.Activity: Active against S. aureus, B. cereus, S. lactis (MIC 41 uM). It also inhibited biofilm formation of S. mutans (Shang D et al., 2014).Peptide conjugate: A conjugate containing this peptide binds LPS (Golda et al., 2018). Another conjugate showed antiviral effect on herpes simplex virus type 1 (HSV-1) (Golda et al., 2024).Updated 3/3020; 7/2024.
Literature Information.Author: Shang D, Yu F, Li J, Zheng J, Zhang L, Li Y.2009
Literature Information.Title: Molecular cloning of cDNAs encoding antimicrobial peptide precursors from the skin of the Chinese brown frog, Rana chensinensis.
